name: takzir-frontend
description: Takzir Equipment Maintenance Ticket System - Frontend

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && npm run optimize
scripts.clean: rimraf dist || (if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist)
scripts.optimize: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-css: node -e "console.log('CSS minification - add postcss/cssnano if needed')"
scripts.minify-js: node -e "console.log('JS minification - add terser if needed')"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview

author: IDF Maintenance Team
